attributes.action: respond to public opinion regarding European treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: when issues such as this arise, that are of national importance, and there is an obvious public reaction against the route being taken by Government, the Prime minister must remember that he is a British public servant, paid from the public purse,and on taking office he and his ministers do not automatically inherit an expert understanding of every subject. He must remember he also serves British subjects who do not always agree with him and on this occasion and other important issues, call a referendum.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
